Articles.Content:
The ground vanished and I found myself travelling to the centre of the planet.  As you can see from the image, I am over 12,000 metres below the surface.  The craft eventually came out the other side and is now on an escape trajectory out of the solar system (see bottom image).

 

Here is a link to the save:  https://drive.google.com/file/d/1BLzIk3IClnp6EaKViC0OpU_IfXcTxyZc/view?usp=share_link

 

 

Edited April 18, 2023 by Klapaucius

I tried landing on Dres's equatorial ridge today. Approaching the surface I noticed the altimeter still read over 2000m, and yes it was set to ground mode. Ship went straight through the surface and fell to the center of Dres before being ejected from the solar system. Reloaded and tried landing just north of the ridge and it all went as planned.
Had the same issue on Duna, although the rocket in my case exploded after a while. It seems to occur when I revert to a save at random times.
